issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Add WM event traces at query level for debugging

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

comments.body: Thanks [~olegd] for reporting. Yes. That's a bug. Would need to iterate and remove. Do you want to put up a patch for this? I can review it and get it committed.
[~prasanth_j], here is it. I hope this is what was expected :)

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12906794/HIVE-18492.patch

ATTACHMENT ID: 12907025 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

Updated the patch for tests. Looks like something (line endings?) is making git not like the original patches.

+1 for the fix; is it easy to add a regression unit test for this? TestWorkloadManager has various tests.
Actually given the nature of the objects equals could be replaced with ==

ATTACHMENT ID: 12909848 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

Committed to master.
Thanks for the patch and the reviews!
This jira is resolved and released with Hive 3.0 If you find an issue with it, please create a new jira.
